de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.exception

Class PayException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • de.luis.kioskComponents.ePayment.exception.PayException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandException, CommunicationException, ConfigException, CryptingException, LicenseException, LoginFirstException, MerchantJournalException, NoTransactionException, ParameterException, ResourceLockedException

    public class PayException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Project: LUIS ePayment

    This is the base class for all exceptions thrown within LUIS ePayment.

    Version:
    $Revision: 1.24 $
    Author:
    M. Gelfort
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
